title: Can I crack NTSE Stage 1 in 45 days? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yeah you can crack it in 45 days . First make a good base on NCERT books (IX & X) . For some concepts in biology refer NCERT bio book and it's important to study NCERT social studies book thoroughly. You should give more time on the MAT section. Follow NCERT for the scholastic aptitude section of NTSE. You must also read a good general knowledge book for ‘out of the course’ questions. Analyse your performance every time and practice sample papers. Good luck…

Though even the impossible says I’am possible, but clearing a exam with merit list is something difficult to be cleared in just 45 days It all depends, how well you prepared yourself for class IX exam and your quarterly exams of class X and then most importantly on your luck. Bieng a MCQ paper, if luck is in your favour then you can easily clear it
